author: Stereogum
title: Queens Of The Stone Age Call Donald Trump A “Barf Inducing, Fascist, Clown Penis”
text: So many musicians have criticized Donald Trump at this point that you have to be especially creative to separate your condemnation from the pack. Queens Of The Stone Age really stepped up to the plate with their latest Instagram screed , though, so let's applaud their inventively insulting parlance toward our rightfully unpopular commander in … More »
